Hero.Description: Works with your own API key. Seamlessly switch providers within a single chat. Minimal UI with full dark mode support.

Features.Title: Features
Features.Subtitle: BYO key · Multi-provider · Switch inside chat

Feature1.Title: BYO API Key
Feature1.Description: Use your own API key. Keys can be stored locally or in encrypted storage, depending on your needs.

Feature2.Title: Multiple Providers
Feature2.Description: Currently, only Hugging Face is supported, but we plan to expand in the future.

Feature3.Title: Switch Within Chat
Feature3.Description: Switch providers per thread or per message while preserving context.

Step1.Title: Prepare Your API Key
Step1.Description: Have your API key ready. Keys can be stored locally or managed via environment variables.

Step2.Title: Choose a Provider
Step2.Description: Select a model for your task. Add or replace models anytime.

Step3.Title: Switch in Chat
Step3.Description: Switch providers per message within the same conversation. Context is preserved.

Provider1.Title: Hugging Face
Provider1.Description: Access a wide range of models for various tasks.

Provider2.Title: OpenAI
Provider2.Description: Utilize powerful models like GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 for diverse applications.

Delete.Title: Delete Chat
Delete.Description: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
